titleInfo.title: The Cooperative movement in Tsarist and Early Soviet Russia: What role did it play in Nation Building for the Different Ethnies?

name.namePart: SFB 584 Das Politische als Kommunikationsraum in der Geschichte

titleInfo.title: Cooperatives in Ethnic Conflicts: Eastern Europe in the 19th and early 20th Century
